name: Will to Survive : A real-time survival RPG with aliens!
blurb: Will to Survive is a fully real-time survival RPG set in a persistent and perpetual world full of alien invaders.

rewards.reward: HELPFUL SURVIVOR\r\n==============================\r\nYour name in the game's credits. Backer only in-game rewards/perks. Access to a backers only development blog. Exclusive desktop wallpaper artwork. A big thank you! (Approximately $7 USD)

DIGITAL SURVIVOR
==============================
A digital copy of Will to Survive on PC, Mac and Linux. DRM-free! 
==============================
Also includes HELPFUL SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $15 USD)

ARTFUL SURVIVOR
==============================
A high resolution digital art book in PDF format filled full of concept art, in-game art and developer notes.
==============================
Also includes DIGITAL SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $23 USD)

DUAL SURVIVOR
==============================
An extra copy of Will to Survive on PC, Mac and Linux to give to a friend. DRM-free!
==============================
Also includes ARTFUL SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $38 USD)

EARLY BIRD ULTIMATE SURVIVOR
==============================
Early bird special of the ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier which grants access to the Beta version of the game once it is ready.
==============================
Also includes DUAL SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $46 USD)

ULTIMATE SURVIVOR
==============================
Access to the Beta version of the game once it is ready.
==============================
Also includes DUAL SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $76 USD)

POSTAL SCAVENGER
==============================
An exclusive set of Will to Survive postcards.
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $92 USD)

FRIENDLY SCAVENGER
==============================
An exclusive postcard mailed to you on a random date with a personalised message from the developer. Also included is an exclusive set of Will to Survive postcards.
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $126 USD)

CLOTHED SCAVENGER
==============================
A Will to Survive themed backers T-shirt as well as an exclusive set of Will to Survive postcards.
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $153 USD)

PUBLISHED SCAVENGER
==============================
Receive a physical printed version of the art book as well as a Will to Survive themed backers T-shirt and exclusive set of Will to Survive postcards..
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $230 USD)

ULTIMATE SCAVENGER ==============================
Includes a signed poster, t-shirt, physical printed art book and an exclusive set of Will to Survive postcards..
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $307 USD)

DEAD SAVIOUR
==============================
Be a dead corpse in the game and write your own story to be told via diary entries found near to the corpse. These will be used as collectable entries for an in-game perk/reward. Diary entry is subject to review and approval by the developer.
==============================
Also includes the ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $384 USD)

LIVE SAVIOUR
==============================
Appear in the game as a live in-game NPC survivor with your own story, items to trade and missions to complete. You can also choose your name. All NPC details are subject to review and approval by the developer. ==============================
Also includes the ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tier. (Approximately $768 USD)

SKETCHY SCAVENGER
==============================
A signed sketch of the game's protagonist Will drawn by the developer on A4 cartridge paper.
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SCAVENGER and ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tiers. (Approximately $1,152 USD)

PAINTED SCAVENGER
==============================
A signed acrylic painting of the game's protagonist Will on heavy weight A4 acrylic cartridge paper, painted by the developer. Plus a Skype call from the developer.
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SCAVENGER and ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tiers. (Approximately $2,304 USD)

MAYOR OF BRIGHTON
==============================
Appear in the game as the Mayor, help choose the way you appear, what you say and write your back story. You will also receive a hand painted version of your final in game character and will get a monthly Skype call from the developer to chat about the project. All Mayor data is subject to review and approval by the developer. 
==============================
Also includes ULTIMATE SCAVENGER and ULTIMATE SURVIVOR tiers. (Approximately $7,682 USD)
